headline: Jim Cramer Couldn’t Stop Praising Corning Incorporated (GLW)

headline: Electronic Components Stocks Q2 Recap: Benchmarking Corning (NYSE:GLW)
summary: The end of an earnings season can be a great time to discover new stocks and assess how companies are handling the current business environment. Let’s take a look at how Corning (NYSE:GLW) and the rest of the electronic components stocks fared in Q2.
